event_data.summary: A close game where the Eagles held off a late Patriots comeback attempt.
key_plays: Q1: PHI Jalen Hurts 5yd TD pass to DeVonta Smith
Q2: NE Ezekiel Elliott 2yd TD run
Q3: NE Mac Jones 11yd TD pass to Kendrick Bourne
Q4: NE Hunter Henry 9yd TD pass from Mac Jones (2pt failed)

key_moments.context: START: Mid-3rd quarter, Eagles lead 16-14. Patriots take over after a punt.

key_moments.prompt: Who caught Mac Jones' go-ahead TD pass on this drive?
How did the Eagles respond on their next possession?
What happened on the Patriots' final offensive play?

key_moments.context: END: Patriots fail to convert on 4th down near midfield, Eagles win 25-20.
